rows.label: tev073402_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ten'celeg if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Sun'celeg seems to have performed all of the jobs at
Orphean Technologies, from development to production,
almost entirely by himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG0002
rows.name:
He had so much vitality and such a stunning
understanding of all manner of technology.
Our division parent was truly a great Orphean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG0003
tev073401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Our products remain as high in quality as ever.
In fact, they may be slightly improved due to the
additional experience acquired by Tan'celeg and I.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Such is the power of Ovah. We pass our strengths
down undiminished for successive generations to
build upon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG0010
rows.name:
I understand that the ancient artifacts called joadtanks
can be acquired at Noctilum's Divine Roost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Likewise, spherical EM motors can be gathered
in the rocky mountains near Noctilum's Ensconced
Citadelâ€”although I hear they're quite rare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Finally, bananaleaves can be acquired at Noctilum's
Elephant's Trunk and Humdrum Peaks areas.
I believe that is all of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG1001
rows.name:
Tan'celeg has apparently relocated to the Biahno
water-purification plant to protect it from invaders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG1002
rows.name:
At first, I did not understand why he would risk his
own survival by traveling to such a dangerous area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG1003
rows.name:
But I have begun to suspect that rational self-sacrifice
may also be a part of the Orphe way of life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073401_MSG1004
rows.name:
I also strive to be the sort of Orphean that would
gladly heed my Ovah's orders to sacrifice myself
when necessary.[ST:wait ]
